Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Jeffries' life prior to or as the outbreak began, except that he was an officer for the Atlanta Police Department .
Post-Apocalypse[]: Jeffries is first seen helping Dawn Lerner with a task. Later, he walks with Dawn to her office, and when Dawn stops to talk to Beth , Jeffries continues down the hall to Dawn's office, where he is attacked and devoured by a zombified Joan . Jeffries is mentioned several times by Dawn Lerner when she is speaking with Beth. Dawn kept his badge along with Gorman and Hanson 's badge.
Death[]: Killed By Beth Greene (Indirectly Caused) Joan (Infected) Beth lies to Dawn and Jeffries, saying that Gorman and Joan are looking for her in her office, intentionally sending both of them into the path of the currently undead Joan. Upon reaching the office, Jeffries is attacked by the zombified Joan. As Beth and Noah start to escape, Jeffries is heard screaming. Dawn Lerner (Before Reanimation) Later, he is put down by Dawn to prevent reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Jeffries has killed: Possibly numerous counts of zombies
Name: Jeffries
